The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them did not happen by accidents but by something else: The illegal trade of fossils. So when they stumbled upon something unexpected they experience kidnappings and archaeological sabotage as well.
